contents.text: Welcome to Digitalist Global in San Francisco, where we co-create innovative marketing solutions with our clients.
To explore our portfolio and recent client collaborations, press 1.
For digital marketing campaigns and online strategies, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our digital marketing showcase.

navigationGoals: Quickly view Digitalist’s recent digital marketing campaign case studies.
I want to see examples of online marketing strategies for my veteran-owned small business.
I’d like to deep-dive into your programmatic advertising and cross-channel retargeting strategies.
I’m calling because I’d like to review your digital marketing campaigns.
I’d like to review their digital marketing campaign case studies for research outreach.

contents.text: For creative design projects and branding case studies, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our creative design team.

navigationGoals: Browse their latest creative design and branding examples.
I'd like to review creative branding case studies to refresh my nonprofit’s identity.
I’d like to analyze your UX/UI design systems and branding guidelines from recent case studies.
I’d like to see examples of your creative design and branding projects.
I want to explore their creative design portfolio to guide my poster and branding.

contents.text: To speak with our marketing experts and discuss your next project, press 2.
To request a new partnership or collaboration, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships director.

navigationGoals: Connect with the partnerships director to discuss a new collaboration.
I need to discuss setting up a collaboration for a veteran outreach campaign.
I want to explore a strategic API integration partnership between our SaaS platform and your marketing services.
I want to speak about forming a new partnership.
I’m looking to propose a collaboration on a student-led physics outreach project.

contents.text: To schedule a consultation with an account manager, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to an account manager.

navigationGoals: Schedule a consultation with an account manager for my upcoming project.
I’d like to schedule a consultation with an account manager about our marketing needs.
I need to schedule a scoping session to align on project requirements, deliverables, and KPIs.
I’d like to schedule a consultation with an account manager.
I need to schedule a consultation to plan marketing for my upcoming research seminar series.
